education.title: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi (KMUTT)
education.description: Graduated with First Class Honors. Coursework included algorithms, machine learning, and digital signal processing.

extracurricularActivities.title: IQM Quantum School
extracurricularActivities.description: Intensive 3-day program in quantum computing, including hands-on implementation of core quantum algorithms (Bernstein–Vazirani, Grover’s Search, and QAOA) on real quantum hardware, alongside learning about hardware architecture and pulse-level quantum control.

extracurricularActivities.title: Neuromatch Summer School - Deep Learning Track
extracurricularActivities.description: Three-week intensive summer school featuring hands-on tutorials and collaborative group projects focused on deep learning methods applied to neuroscience. Our group built an RL model to imitate human and pigeon risky-choice behavior.

extracurricularActivities.title: Lunghwa University Holiday School (Language and Culture Camp)
extracurricularActivities.description: Selected as one of 25 participants for a language and culture camp focused on learning basic Chinese and exploring Taiwanese culture through lectures and immersive cultural trips.

extracurricularActivities.title: UMAP Discovery Camp
extracurricularActivities.position: Representative of King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi
extracurricularActivities.description: Represented King Mongkut’s University of Technology Thonburi in a two-week international summer program promoting Thai language, culture, arts, and cuisine across regions under the theme "Global Citizenship."

publications.title: Machine Learning Assisted Dynamic Scheduling for Energy Efficient Serverless Cloud Workloads
publications.description: Serverless cloud computing can reduce data center energy consumption by turning off idle resources, but scheduling remains challenging when workload resource demands are unknown ahead of deployment. We propose a Deep Q-learning (DQN) scheduler integrated into Kubernetes that consolidates workloads onto fewer active nodes to minimize cluster power consumption, outperforming baselines (Random, Round Robin, Best Fit, Default Kubernetes Scheduler), while revealing an inherent energy–performance tradeoff.

achievementsAwards.title: JUNCTION Hackathon
achievementsAwards.description: Won 2nd Place in the n8n Tech Challenge by developing an AI-assisted security assessor that transforms product data (name, URL, vendor, hash) into a CISO-ready brief using agentic AI with n8n and Gemini.

achievementsAwards.title: F10: Fintech Hackathon
achievementsAwards.description: Top 15 finalists out of 40 teams as "What the Hack" team to solve the problem statements given by Julius Bar (private banking): find the way to create a touchpoint for the next generation.

achievementsAwards.title: We Power Road Safety Digital Creator by Shell
achievementsAwards.description: Won a recognition award in the gamification category as "Team V Power" by developing an educational game designed to promote road safety awareness and a safety mindset among schoolchildren.

achievementsAwards.title: Data Science Hackathon by RISE Accelerator
achievementsAwards.description: Top 8 finalist out of 32 teams, addressing a PTTEP challenge on smarter energy consumption. Proposed a Green Delivery solution using a design thinking approach, including real user research, UI prototyping, and data analysis, with K-means clustering applied to segment customer purchase behavior by geographic region.

achievementsAwards.title: KMUTT Qualified Hands-on Engineer (Monotsukuri Engineer)
achievementsAwards.description: Awarded a full scholarship as one of 18 selected engineering students to visit 5 leading universities and 11 factories in Japan, gaining hands-on exposure to Japanese engineering practices, work ethic, and industrial culture.

achievementsAwards.title: Workshop Better UX, Better KMUTT
achievementsAwards.description: Won Best Project award for designing and prototyping a digital university shuttle bus stop sign, improving user experience by addressing key user pain points identified through UX research.
